channel.title: [508] Newbie needs help [508]
channel.description:
[b]Hi masters of moparscape,[/b] I am new with 508 source. So I ask you some help: [b]1.[/b] How to fix this error: When i press on object, server runner writes [b]([/b] Unhandled object height: ItemID[b])[/b] Here is pic : [img]http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/3025/bepavadinimoin.png[/img] [b]2.[/b] How to make quests [b]([/b]i know the topic, but it doesn't help me[b])[/b] [b]3.[/b] How to add models. [b]4.[/b] How to check my coordinates [b]([/b]command ::myposs doesn't work[b]) ([/b]if possible how to add command to see my coordinates[b])[/b] The first who help me will get free moderator status in my server !
[b]Sorry for my bad English ...[/b]

item.title: [508] Newbie needs help [508]
item.dc:creator: @Sw3das Sw3das
item.description:
@Sw3das wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:6, topic:365766”][quote author=Sw3das link=topic=461962.msg3379602#msg3379602 date=1287923949]
Thanks, you halped me a lot. Say do you where I can change my server IP ???
[/quote]

Please be more specific, do you mean in a client or what? No-ip?[/quote]

I want to change my server IP. Like mortable.sytes.net but i don’t find where …

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Newbie needs help [508]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I believe this is the Mypos command you want,

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) {
c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX);
c.sendMessage("Y: "+c.absY);
}

Also, on the quest question. You need to be more specific about what you don’t understand otherwise we cannot help you.

And for adding models, searching doesn’t hurt:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Newbie needs help [508]
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

it means the object doesn’t have a command for itself, In other words, the object is useless. you have to add a command or something to it, but im not 100%

@Sw3das wrote:

Hi masters of moparscape,
I am new with 508 source. So I ask you some help:
1. How to fix this error:
When i press on object, server runner writes ( Unhandled object height: ItemID)
Here is pic :

2. How to make quests (i know the topic, but it doesn’t help me)

The first who help me will get free moderator status in my server !
